We are fortunate to have spent our entire working careers, 55 years cumulatively, learning about wine and developing lasting relationships in the food and wine community. In short, we feel that just as our first vintage was placed in restaurants in short order, our second vintage will be successful finding it's way to wine lists and retailer's shelves. With your help, Savage can ascend from regional curiosity to nationwide phenomenon!

If you can't contribute to the campaign at this time, you can still help us out, we'd really appreciate it!

Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter


Share this campaign with and spread the word to your friends! #letsmakewine

story:
What do you want to control today?


"Share Zero Space is the new Social Netwotk of Things and Events".


How will be cool if you can control all wath you want in the real world? 

Yes, imagine how cool it will be when you will be able to control any event you care for in the real world, from every place, by simply accessing a special cloud space and immediately interacting with that event!

This idea jumps over all limits if also you can share this superpowe with your family and with your friends.

All is now possible by using two things: a smart device and a social cloud website

OK, but how does it works?

You only need to have at least one ShareZeroSpace device, here pictured without case and power supply for simplicity.

       (Photo of SZS core board connected + multi pourposes shield on bottom)


You need  to connect the device to the internet network (via cable or wifi)  and to the events you need to control.

The controlled events may for example be related to electrical motor driven gates, light or light systems, socket or socket stripes, irrigation systems, electrical locks, heating or cooling systems.

Or they may consist in events that you need to supervise, such as access to controlled doors, water level controls, power or water metering systems or whatever else is furnished of  an input or output dialogue.

The example below shows the capabilities of core SZS board + multi purposes in/out/temp shield.

This stage will require in most cases ten minutes of work by a non super-tech user, may be you or your electrician, or zero minutes by buying a ready to use device, such the power strip exhibit on demo.


Then you need to register your new ShareZeroSpace device on the cloud, and, after a ultra simple localized language configuration, all is done.


No specialized devices, no apps, no software, no servers, no long time learning curve. By means of any kind of internet connected device, such as mobile phones, tablets, PC’s, internet totems, etc., you can access your ShareZeroSpace zone using your personal account.

Immediately, you be able to operate on your controlled event through a simple and powerful graphic interface.

You can have multiple ShareZeroSpace devices connected and joined to your account in multiple place all over the world. Awesome superpower!.

All is done. But there is more in SZS tech! We introduce the opportunity, with no complications, with no overwork, with no wast of time, to share every single controlled event with others.

The friendsor delegates will be authorized and alerted with a mail that includes the appropriate informations. From this point, your friends can interact with event, and  if you desire, you will be warned anytime. The cool side is that your shared-event friends, in their ZSZ zone on their accounts, can find and use the shared event. When you desire to stop the sharing, with a simple action you can cancel it.

Finally you can also be warned if something has changed status by e-mail, like a opened SZS controlled door or a electric motor failure when SZS will be adopted for check power overcharge.

Also other people may have an account and multiple SZS device under their control, also they can share with you the control of events. It's like a social network of things, instead of a social network of words.

You can do what you want no matter of community (share), no matter of time (zero), no matter of distance (space).

Simple, sure, instantly and primarily all, smart!.

If you help us joining this campaign, we help you not only to enjoy of this smart solution, but we together can really change our way to enjoy life and have more free time and fun!.

Together we can make the difference from suffer the technology to steer technology!

More info on our prezi presentation about business opportunity HERE!

We make the cloud version running well, and you can verify this by connecting to sharezerospace using the credential: e-mail: demo password: 12345. Once you logged in, then click on Zone and then click icon "control" on rigth side of lava lamp row. Please note, in this demo,  user account data is locked for avoiding undesidered user data changement.

At this point you can locate the lamp status indicator and the command icon where, by clicking, you can control the switching of lamp. You also can use a web cam icon, by clicking it and, after you inserted the camera account (user:user, password:user), direct live video will appear on the screen, showing what happens to the lamp at the moment. You can find all the instructions about demo features and vision, in the document    "Thechnology that we really need" .


What We Need & What You Get

We have built hardware and software prototype almost ready for production, complete with a smart all-weather case.

                             ShareZeroSpace device on all-weather case.

           (on left SZS single component and on the rigth SZS ready to ship)

A milestone has been accomplished and a device is ready for production, but more work is needed to make it a ready to market product. This must be equipped with multiple solutions like ready to use power stripe, ready to use irrigation system, possibility of micro cloud applications, and must also include other friendly features in software and an ultra-modern skin.

What we do with your donation if we reach the goal.


Thank's to our local region success ad with local funding in spreading SZS on the last campaign we fix the goal to a special ultra low budget. This allow us to try to diffuse our technology all over the world.

- We plan to design, using the same easiness of use, a better cloud site, also                designed for auto-adapting for all mobile platform such smartphone and tablet and a free downloadable all server platform micro SZS cloud software.

- We want improve languages localization for a better share experience with other people.

- We plan to realize a stylish design case for SZS device, also for accessories.

- We plan to develop battery operated mobile device for mobile lock systems, including GPS active localization, for automotive use and social mobile share like car and cicle pooling, etc.

- We want to promote the use of this tecnology in city council for adopting in public lighting system (for energy saving and on demand use),  water leakege preventing systems, etc.

- We had designed and we plan to develop a new cheap environment monitoring  sensors systems for take care of our planet. We use this tecnology for deploy the our patens in multiple branch of technology. Parking and logistic, environment (smart sensor for monitoring and forewarn; fire, flooding, hurricanes, pollution) ,  personal security, etc. (if you are interested on our patent  search Mario Puppo as inventor in EPO database).

- We just have extend the SZS patent we made all over the world

We worked hard since more than one year for present you this challenge. It's real, and you can direcly try with the demo. But with your help as we had explain, we can finally complete what we have in mind and what we have included in our working plan here described.

What you get


If you will be a part of this evolution being an early adopter of this technology and of this new vision, you will be a part of a new way of thinking globally, but actually you can immediately enjoy the perks derived by the adoption of ShareZeroSpace model.

If you decide to partecipate to this campaign, even also with a litte donation, we will hear you on all of your suggest for improve SZS technology

In return, depending on what perks you choose, you may get the coolest ShareZeroSpace device fully functional with wifi and power supply included  in a smart all-weather case with full of documentation and you are free forever to use the SZS cloud. If you are a developer or simply you want to adopt this technology on your website or on your own developed cloud application, join the developers program by choosign perks including  SDK+ SZS Cloud source software, to have complete access to software and hardware resources.


                      (SZS fully assembled with pwr and wifi ready to ship)


If you are experienced developer  and if you want to develop shield yourself, base developing device is also available consisting of a core SZS smart device + software and hardware resources. This will let you do develop your personal type of device based on SZS technology and start to create your micro-cloud SZS for your need our for your markets.

Due to many request we receive after this campaign was started, we also decide to dovelop and propose (included in perks) a stand alone SZS cloud server for anyone want to create personal and private SZS cloud server. (read Q&A and also Update)

Your found will be used for this, only for this!. So, please hep us, donate or  join  perks and enjoy about this unique possibilities.
Rest assured we will notify everyone of what's going on so there will be no surprises at all.

The Impact

We are a small company and without you, we cannot free the complete power of SZS tech. We want to continue to work on these technology because we trust on it. We have adopted it as first user, daily, and we are sure it will give you the benefits you are searching for.

Without your contributions, we cannot afford to pay  for manufacturing the of the ready to market products and for improving  the cloud software platform, so please donate!  With your help, we can bring Share Zero Space technology into the world and your make more and more simple saving time,  sharing opportunities and be more happy.

We trust that toegether we can deliver the most disruptive and revolutionary tech of new millenium!.

Risks & Challenges

The major risk, for you and us together, is to loose an opportunity. Losing this challenge means loosing the opportunities to finally have technology that we really need, that we really want.

The dream of a real world connected as described above is one step from reality. Daily we use the SZS technology and the prototypes. We will be happy to share with the world our daily personal experience.

We worked hard for doing what we offer to you today. Give power to this real opportunity, join us and claim your perks.   

Our family, our friends, from now enjoy of this happiness, now it's your time.


Shiping cost of pledge

We are able to ship your pledged materials all over the world. We do not want to overcharge shipping cost, so you can pay the shipping cost exactly for destination.
So you need to add shipping cost to the pledge you choose.

We have negotiate shipping cost for all over the world cost, They are:

Europe and Middle East                |         $ 20
Rest of the world                            |         $ 30

This includes standard international post shipping. If you need or you want to use international express shipping, pease let us to know and we arrange the best shippig cost for sending goods with DHL, UPS, FedEx.

Please Note:

Shipping cost do no apply to perks regarding stikers. In this case shipping cost are included.

  • our shipping rates do not include any taxes or charges you may incur on arrival in your country.

  • combined shipping, at this time we do not have any price estimates for combined shipping, currently it is more cost effective to send each product individually and we are still working with DHL to get better rates ASAP.

In every case of doubt, feel freeto  contact us. We enjoy to help you.


Other Ways You Can Help

We are happy of what you can do! In every case if you like our vision and our concrete solutions, please share with others, no matter if are friends or not, the awesome ShareZeroSpace challenge. Share is a big part of vision, because in every case, 1+1 is more than two.

So, invite, let others to know this opportunities, and finally, if this challenge will be accomplished, even you, can enjoy about the success,  maybe using your personal ShareZeroSpace device or any event shared with you by your friends or your company.


Questions and Answers (Q&A)

Q: I like solutions offered by SZS but what's about the question I want make a private cloud running only on my private network.

A: Hi funder. No problem, if you buy a micro-cloud server running SZS you can create your personal and even private SZS cloud. This mean you can put it in you private network and running it by controlling and sharing event like the world wide cloud on your private network.
If you connect it to the internet (e.g. by your home adsl or wan) this will spread all over the world, and you can reach from any place, but remain your provate SZS cloud 

Q: After buy a SZS device, how I need to do for connect it to SZS cloud for control and share event connected to my SZS device

A: What is needed is simply input the unicode serial string (proviced with yout SZS device) in the page "Device" after clicking add device. After this operation,you can assign descriptive names to your events and after configuring Ip address of yor network all is done. From now you'll find all event in your "Zone" page.  You can from now; control, share and delegate any event. SZS Cloud allow you can do everythings  from any device connected to the internet all over the world.

Q: Why you think the product also without case?

A: Because we consider the owner want to embed the SZS device in their appliance instead of place another case. However, we design the all-weather case for everytype of installation, inside and outside. In the future we plan to have a case for inside with better design.

Q: How long takes to electrically connect SZS device to an event?

A: Depend on event. In most case, like the electric gate, the irrigations system, the garden lights, etc. is a question of minutes. Consider that digital output o SZS device consist in a relay with open-common-close contact. It's like to connect a standard switch. 

Q: Can I use SZS device like a smart house bus component?

A: Yes, the SZS device can work like a smart house bus component. Configuring it with function "digital input act on related digital output"  and all is done. Locally you'll connect the wall switch to digital input and the related digital output (relay) will work like a switch. From this point you can locally switching the charge (eg.lamp) with your old wall switch and remotely you can use SZS cloud  in your account for control the switch event. The output can work like a two state switch (open/close) or if you want like a push button with desidered hold time (programmable). The power stripe output wokr like this. Remotely you can control related output socket and locally the same using the small red button (see socket stripe demo's photo). Feedback on SZS cloud is always the true state of input or output.  

Q: What type of internet connection need SZS device

A: SZS device work with all type of internet connection from super slow 33.6K, to a fast 100M fiber optic. Every type such fixed ADSL, WAN, HDSL work well and for mobile applications GPRS, 3G, 4G are suitable.
Traffic from SZS clousd and SZS device use a very small bandwith and the footrprint of SZS on your network is very small.

Q: What about SZS device in mobile use

A: SZS device work perfecty in mobile use. The device can work with a low power supply (9-12 VDC@ 0.6A max with all relay engaged) and is suitable to work with battery operated or with energy saving system such battery and solar pannel. Communication with internet can be realized using a GPRS, 3G or 4G connection. If SZS device is equipped with a WiFi expansion, it can operate also using smartphone or portable router. This means you can use for eg. for control door car opening or anti theft solution for cutting fuel simply stopping electric fuel car pump.
story_txt:
What do you want to control today?
"Share Zero Space is the new Social Netwotk of Things and Events". 
How will be cool if you can control all wath you want in the real world?  Yes, imagine how cool it will be when you will be able to control any event you care for in the real world, from every place, by simply accessing a special cloud space and immediately interacting with that event!This idea jumps over all limits if also you can share this superpowe with your family and with your friends.
All is now possible by using two things: a smart device and a social cloud websiteOK, but how does it works?

You only need to have at least one ShareZeroSpace device, here pictured without case and power supply for simplicity.
       (Photo of SZS core board connected + multi pourposes shield on bottom)

You need  to connect the device to the internet network (via cable or wifi)  and to the events you need to control. 
The controlled events may for example be related to electrical motor driven gates, light or light systems, socket or socket stripes, irrigation systems, electrical locks, heating or cooling systems. 
Or they may consist in events that you need to supervise, such as access to controlled doors, water level controls, power or water metering systems or whatever else is furnished of  an input or output dialogue. 
The example below shows the capabilities of core SZS board + multi purposes in/out/temp shield.
This stage will require in most cases ten minutes of work by a non super-tech user, may be you or your electrician, or zero minutes by buying a ready to use device, such the power strip exhibit on demo.
Then you need to register your new ShareZeroSpace device on the cloud, and, after a ultra simple localized language configuration, all is done.
No specialized devices, no apps, no software, no servers, no long time learning curve. By means of any kind of internet connected device, such as mobile phones, tablets, PC’s, internet totems, etc., you can access your ShareZeroSpace zone using your personal account. Immediately, you be able to operate on your controlled event through a simple and powerful graphic interface.
You can have multiple ShareZeroSpace devices connected and joined to your account in multiple place all over the world. Awesome superpower!.All is done. But there is more in SZS tech! We introduce the opportunity, with no complications, with no overwork, with no wast of time, to share every single controlled event with others.The friendsor delegates will be authorized and alerted with a mail that includes the appropriate informations. From this point, your friends can interact with event, and  if you desire, you will be warned anytime. The cool side is that your shared-event friends, in their ZSZ zone on their accounts, can find and use the shared event. When you desire to stop the sharing, with a simple action you can cancel it. Finally you can also be warned if something has changed status by e-mail, like a opened SZS controlled door or a electric motor failure when SZS will be adopted for check power overcharge.Also other people may have an account and multiple SZS device under their control, also they can share with you the control of events. It's like a social network of things, instead of a social network of words. You can do what you want no matter of community (share), no matter of time (zero), no matter of distance (space). Simple, sure, instantly and primarily all, smart!.If you help us joining this campaign, we help you not only to enjoy of this smart solution, but we together can really change our way to enjoy life and have more free time and fun!.Together we can make the difference from suffer the technology to steer technology!More info on our prezi presentation about business opportunity HERE!
We make the cloud version running well,
and you can verify this by connecting to sharezerospace using the credential: e-mail: demo password: 12345. Once you logged in, then click on Zone and then click icon "control" on rigth side of lava lamp row. Please note, in this demo,  user account data is locked for avoiding undesidered user data changement.At this point you can locate the lamp status indicator and the command icon where, by clicking, you can control the switching of lamp. You also can use a web cam icon, by clicking it and, after you inserted the camera account (user:user, password:user), direct live video will appear on the screen, showing what happens to the lamp at the moment. You can find all the instructions about demo features and vision, in the document    "Thechnology that we really need" .

What We Need & What You Get
We have built hardware and software prototype almost ready for production, complete with a smart all-weather case.                             ShareZeroSpace device on all-weather case.            (on left SZS single component and on the rigth SZS ready to ship)A milestone has been accomplished and a device is ready for production, but more work is needed to make it a ready to market product. This must be equipped with multiple solutions like ready to use power stripe, ready to use irrigation system, possibility of micro cloud applications, and must also include other friendly features in software and an ultra-modern skin. What we do with your donation if we reach the goal.Thank's to our local region success ad with local funding in spreading SZS on the last campaign we fix the goal to a special ultra low budget. This allow us to try to diffuse our technology all over the world.- We plan to design, using the same easiness of use, a better cloud site, also                designed for auto-adapting for all mobile platform such smartphone and tablet and a free downloadable all server platform micro SZS cloud software. - We want improve languages localization for a better share experience with other people.- We plan to realize a stylish design case for SZS device, also for accessories.- We plan to develop battery operated mobile device for mobile lock systems, including GPS active localization, for automotive use and social mobile share like car and cicle pooling, etc.- We want to promote the use of this tecnology in city council for adopting in public lighting system (for energy saving and on demand use),  water leakege preventing systems, etc.- We had designed and we plan to develop a new cheap environment monitoring  sensors systems for take care of our planet. We use this tecnology for deploy the our patens in multiple branch of technology. Parking and logistic, environment (smart sensor for monitoring and forewarn; fire, flooding, hurricanes, pollution) ,  personal security, etc. (if you are interested on our patent  search Mario Puppo as inventor in EPO database).- We just have extend the SZS patent we made all over the worldWe worked hard since more than one year for present you this challenge. It's real, and you can direcly try with the demo. But with your help as we had explain, we can finally complete what we have in mind and what we have included in our working plan here described.What you get If you will be a part of this evolution being an early adopter of this technology and of this new vision, you will be a part of a new way of thinking globally, but actually you can immediately enjoy the perks derived by the adoption of ShareZeroSpace model.If you decide to partecipate to this campaign, even also with a litte donation, we will hear you on all of your suggest for improve SZS technologyIn return, depending on what perks you choose, you may get the coolest ShareZeroSpace device fully functional with wifi and power supply included  in a smart all-weather case with full of documentation and you are free forever to use the SZS cloud. If you are a developer or simply you want to adopt this technology on your website or on your own developed cloud application, join the developers program by choosign perks including  SDK+ SZS Cloud source software, to have complete access to software and hardware resources.                       (SZS fully assembled with pwr and wifi ready to ship)
 If you are experienced developer  and if you want to develop shield yourself, base developing device is also available consisting of a core SZS smart device + software and hardware resources. This will let you do develop your personal type of device based on SZS technology and start to create your micro-cloud SZS for your need our for your markets. story:
Well, mushroom science WILL save the earth soon

And, yup. We are amateurs in front of a camera. No apologies, but our WRITTEN REPORT is the hot topic, so please watch or read below and help us tell the world!

Our Story

Mission:

We are writing a report to share with the world to raise global awareness and help accelerate consumer demand for this new, completely green technology.

We believe the greening and environmental recovery of our planet will be a reality in our lifetime.  Households simply need to know and ask for it. This campaign is a tool in the goal.

Background:

Last year, Fungi Magazine (http://www.fungimag.com/) requested an article about bio-composite technology that uses mushroom plants (mycelia) to grow â€“ yes, GROW â€“ packaging shapes to cushion and protect items in shipping.

The article for Fungi Magazine tentatively titled â€œEcovativeâ€™s Breakthrough Biomaterials: Materials for the future, made with stuff that was here all alongâ€ is about creativity, innovation, market driven, cost effective, competitive and environmentally friendly technologies using components from the mushroom kingdom.

Fungi Magazine cannot afford to pay for this major piece, but the Editor agrees the whole project should be shared.  We are turning to crowd-funding so we may share this critically important story with the world.

Why is this so important? New science, new industry, more jobs, cradle-to-cradle material science, non-competing for food or feedstock, eliminating plastics for our oceans, non-toxic construction materials plus more!


Respectfully,

Penelope Zeller

 

What We Need & What You Get

 Your â€œGetâ€

Â·                     Be a hero!  Claim your place in history as a â€œGreen Global Game Changerâ€. Even a $5 donation gets you our specially designed GGGC button!

Â·                     Living on a healthier Earth much sooner than you ever imagined.

Â·                     Participate in bringing the next generation of affordable sustainable products to market quickly

Â·                     Look to the right for fantastic perks in exchange for your support

 We need:

Â·                     Funds â€“ Your financial support will help us bootstrap this and future projects for the benefit of consumers, business and the environment.

Â·                     Spread the word â€“ help make this information viral.

 

The Impact

Our article and this campaign intends to:

Â·                     Illustrate that the expansion of bio-composite material science will create jobs in new industries contributing to a new economy without polluting. (This isn't like any other 'green' technology that currently exists! Using mushroom technology is the only cradle-to-cradle material science that can compete in cost effectiveness with EPS.) 

Â·                     Create global consumer demand for technologies that replace products with negative environmental impact.  The more people know that these products are readily available now, the faster business will respond to bring these to market

Â·                     Expose powerful incentives to focus more resources to the study of mycology.

Â·                     Encourage enhancing our world by redirecting petroleum based synthetic materials for long term use.

Â·                     Create expectation of significant reduction in non-biodegradable and hard to recycle plastics from the single-use waste stream.

Â·                     Illustrate that there are ideas for other market driven applications using the science and study of mycology to develop materials that are not just green, but better â€“ economically and in terms of performance are available now.

Call to Action

Â·                     Forward our link to everyone in your e-list with a short note of support.

Â·                     Make a call to action on Facebook, Linked In, Twitter and other social media sites

Â·                     Text your contact list or give someone a call

Â·                     Tell your own family, neighbors and the businesses where you trade.

Â·                     Print out the flyers from the gallery and hand them out.

Â·                     Support us with words of encouragement in the comment section.


 The team is not waiting for the crowd-funding campaign to end.  We are already underway on the project and target completion for the report so it can be published in the March 2012 (subscription-only) issue of the magazine. When the funding campaign is successful Fungi Magazine will post the entire report on their website to share with the world in early April 2012.


Thank you in advance for your interest, your support and for spreading the word to your professional colleagues and friends about this effort!  Together, we can shape our consumer world.

Comments and Other Ways You Can Help   ---  Spread this story to everyone you know, people of all ages, strangers even. Letting others know about this campaign would be greatly appreciated. The more people who know, the faster we will be able to put the larger program to work!

story:
so stoked to receive the news that 30+ orphans have moved into a home with screens, safe running water, sewage and electricity as a result of the work we did. thank you all for your support and participation. please consider sharing our link and/or making a monetary contribution. MAHALOS

 

We are just two guys that have found immense relief, by learning the hard way, that serving others is the ultimate fulfillment in this life. While this is something that we try to incorporate into our daily lives, the opportunity to serve some of the most impoverished and disenfranchised people in human history is uncommon but welcome. When a friend of Keith's made mention of the trip, he was (and is) willing to go volunteer out of pocket. When Keith made mention to Kevin, he was also willing to go volunteer out of pocket, but might be a little bit more selfless (and humble) because he quickly realized this could be an opportunity for many to contribute their hard-earned and well-deserved money to a worthy cause. Being familiar with self-organized fundraisers and the relatively recent phenomenon of crowdsourcing and social media utilization for this sort of thing, we figured it was worth a shot. So here's where you come in - donate whatever you want, or just post our link to your social media and spread the word otherwise however you want, but do it often! The goal of $5,000 was chosen pretty arbitrarily, with estimated costs for volunteers around $1,600 per person. We would love to raise enough money to make a nice cash donation, or maybe use the cash to buy something really useful for the kids (at the staff's suggestion). The deadline of September 12 was chosen because it is Andy Landers' birthday, and he is an amazing example of dedication and discipline in devotion to social justice.
story_txt:
so stoked to receive the news that 30+ orphans have moved into a home with screens, safe running water, sewage and electricity as a result of the work we did. thank you all for your support and participation. please consider sharing our link and/or making a monetary contribution. MAHALOS
 
We are just two guys that have found immense relief, by learning the hard way, that serving others is the ultimate fulfillment in this life. While this is something that we try to incorporate into our daily lives, the opportunity to serve some of the most impoverished and disenfranchised people in human history is uncommon but welcome. When a friend of Keith's made mention of the trip, he was (and is) willing to go volunteer out of pocket. When Keith made mention to Kevin, he was also willing to go volunteer out of pocket, but might be a little bit more selfless (and humble) because he quickly realized this could be an opportunity for many to contribute their hard-earned and well-deserved money to a worthy cause. Being familiar with self-organized fundraisers and the relatively recent phenomenon of crowdsourcing and social media utilization for this sort of thing, we figured it was worth a shot. So here's where you come in - donate whatever you want, or just post our link to your social media and spread the word otherwise however you want, but do it often! The goal of $5,000 was chosen pretty arbitrarily, with estimated costs for volunteers around $1,600 per person. We would love to raise enough money to make a nice cash donation, or maybe use the cash to buy something really useful for the kids (at the staff's suggestion). The deadline of September 12 was chosen because it is Andy Landers' birthday, and he is an amazing example of dedication and discipline in devotion to social justice.
